title: Typo in Zlieans Rewind ability  (RIOT FIX)
body: theres a pretty noticeable typo in his ability description at the end.

replies.body:
Nice catch! 

Thanks for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tLZe7v8X,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-28T18:38:14.248+0000)
>
> Nice catch! 
> 
> Thanks for the report!

The League webpage also still represents Ashe's old kit. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Krys Star,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tLZe7v8X,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-28T21:21:18.273+0000)
>
> The League webpage also still represents Ashe's old kit. :P

Yup! This is known, and we're working to resolve it. :]
There's also an error on talon's cut throat ability, the video of it still shows the target being silenced.

> [{quoted}](name=The Sionce Guy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tLZe7v8X,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T20:04:43.507+0000)
>
> There's also an error on talon's cut throat ability, the video of it still shows the target being silenced.

Got it, thanks!
